item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 29, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Britain buys semiconductor factory for defence purposes (98 points | 40 comments)
2. Cat memes went viral 100 years ago (60 points | 17 comments)
3. Four more health care workers ill after caring for bird flu case in Missouri (88 points | 2 comments)
4. The perils of transition to 64-bit time_t (191 points | 139 comments)
5. FFT-based ocean-wave rendering, implemented in Godot (658 points | 86 comments)
6. Notion's Midlife Crisis (81 points | 44 comments)
7. Reverse-engineering a three-axis attitude indicator from the F-4 fighter plane (129 points | 41 comments)
8. The Little Typer (2018) (122 points | 28 comments)
9. Show HN: Open-source app builder for comfy workflows (16 points | 3 comments)
10. Show HN: Iceoryx2 – Fast IPC Library for Rust, C++, and C (22 points | 6 comments)
11. Show HN: Mitata – Benchmarking tooling for JavaScript (62 points | 19 comments)
12. Autossh – automatically restart SSH sessions and tunnels (114 points | 58 comments)
13. Theattyr: A terminal theater for playing VT100 art and animations (6 points | discuss)
14. SunVox: Powerful Modular Synthesizer and DAW (146 points | 39 comments)
15. Science-based games and explorable explanations (11 points | 1 comment)
16. If AI seems smarter, it's thanks to smarter human trainers (101 points | 89 comments)
17. REPL for Dart (71 points | 27 comments)
18. The U.S. is approving citizenship applications at the fastest speed in years (30 points | 15 comments)
19. How Discord stores trillions of messages (70 points | 28 comments)
20. MtCellEdit – Lightweight Spreadsheet Program (128 points | 41 comments)
21. The Design of Text Editors (12 points | 3 comments)
22. Amusing Ourselves to Death (2014) (380 points | 259 comments)
23. Man-in-the-Middle PCB Unlocks HP Ink Cartridges (12 points | 2 comments)
24. Possible Cluster of Human Bird-Flu Infections Expands in Missouri (68 points | 18 comments)
25. Walking on the Moon in Cologne: Europe's lunar life simulator (27 points | 3 comments)
26. Building a compile-time SIMD optimized smoothing filter (75 points | 17 comments)
27. Everything you need to know about Python 3.13 – JIT and GIL went up the hill (343 points | 182 comments)
28. A few secure, random bytes without `pgcrypto` (44 points | 33 comments)
29. Icon (real creators, AI ads) is hiring founding engineers/ex-founders (NYC) ( | hide)
30. SpaceX launches rescue mission for 2 NASA astronauts who are stuck on the ISS (53 points | 38 comments)
